name: Criminal Clue - Spot The Difference
description:
Criminal Clue - Spot The Difference is a brain puzzle, where you will have to find the differences between two pictures each time you play.


Game Features:
- 40 play scenes available.
- Support for iPad devices,
- Hints and boosters which will help you to find all the evidences.
- iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus support!

Have fun solving the criminal puzzles.
